description: File dropzone component that allows users to drag and drop files for upload.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the file dropzone element

properties.name: fileDraggedOverInstructions
properties.description: Custom instructions shown when files are dragged over the dropzone

properties.name: instructions
properties.description: Custom instructions shown as the default dropzone message

properties.name: invalidFileTypeMessage
properties.description: Custom error message displayed when an invalid file type is selected

properties.name: maxFileNameLength
properties.description: Maximum allowed length of filename, will show error if exceeded

properties.name: maxFileCount
properties.description: Maximum number of files allowed, will show error if exceeded

properties.name: maxTotalFileSizeBytes
properties.description: Maximum total file size in bytes allowed, will show error if exceeded

properties.name: successMessage
properties.description: Success message displayed when files are uploaded successfully

events.name: fileSelect
events.description: Event emitted when files are selected

args.instructions: 'Drag files here or browse to upload'
'Drag files here or browse to upload'
